titleStmt.title: The prophecy of Bishop Usher unto which is added two letters, one from Sir William Boswell ... to the Most Reverend William Laud ... : the other from the Reverend John Bramhall ... to the Most Reverend James Usher, late Archbishop of Armah.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.
Boswell, William, Sir, d. 1649.
Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
